pages.text: $(italic)It happened again and again that you just want to quickly put down a box to store your inventory there and as soon as you came back everything was looted.$(br)To solve this problem you have developed this special chest, which takes care of the problem and incidentally helps to catch the thief in the act.

The Personal Chest provides the same space as two normal chests.$(br2)Like a Trapped Chest the Private Chests also outputs a redstone signal based on who opened it. If you as an owner open it, the signal strength will be full, if a stranger wants to tamper with your belongings then only half.
